Iranian Newspapers

World-Newspapers Link: http://www.world-newspapers.com/index.html > Middle East Link: http://www.world-newspapers.com/east.html > Iran

AhlulBayt News Agency (ABNA) Link: http://www.abna.ir/english Daily updated collection of news related to everything in the view of Shia.

Alalam News Network Link: http://en.alalam.ir/ Tehran-based Al Alam international news channel promoting information-dissemination process, develop coverage and facilitate access of Arab and non-Arab audience to alternative voices.

CHN News Agency Link: http://chnpress.ir/ Iran's Cultural Heritage News Agency covers culture and cultural heritage news.

Ettela'at Newspaper Link: http://www.ettelaat.com/index2.asp?code=etb8 International Persian daily newspaper.

Fars News Agency Link: http://english.farsnews.net/ Semi-official news service.

Financial Tribune Link: http://financialtribune.com/ Iranian economic news daily.

International Quran News Agency (IQNA) Link: http://www.iqna.ir/en First and only specialized Quran news agency in the Islamic world.

Iran Book News Agency (IBNA) Link: http://www.ibna.ir/en/ IBNA is a news agency focusing on books. In addition to publishing news, IBNA offers updated reports, interviews and analyses of various foundations and organizations working in different publication fields.

Iran Bulletin Link: http://www.iran-bulletin.org/ Journal of the left dealing with issues of Iran and the Middle East from a democratic, secular and socialist perspective.

Iran Daily Link: http://www.iran-daily.com/ Daily newspaper from Tehran published by the official news agency IRNA.

Iran Daily Brief Link: http://www.irandailybrief.com/ Publishes up-to-date internal and external political Iranian news and analyzes issues of ongoing concern.

Iran Diplomacy Link: http://www.irdiplomacy.ir/en Iranian foreign affairs related news.

Iran English Radio (IRIB) Link: http://english.irib.ir/ Daily news articles and online radio.

Iran Focus Link: http://www.iranfocus.com/en/ Independent non-profit news service provider that focuses on events in Iran, Iraq and the Middle East. Provide news and analysis on the political, social and economic situation in Iran and its effects on the region.

Iran Front Page Link: http://iranfrontpage.com/ Publishing English translation of select items from the Iranian newspapers and magazines.

Iran Herald Link: http://www.iranherald.com/ Iran issues, news from local & global sources.

Iran News Daily Link: http://www.irannewsdaily.com/ Daily newspaper providing domestic and international news. Features review of Iranian newspapers.

Iran Primer Link: http://iranprimer.usip.org/blog Published by United States Institute of Peace.

Iran Project Link: http://theiranproject.com/ Non-professional news website which has been ran by a group of Iranians inside and outside of Iran.

Iran Review Link: http://www.iranreview.org/ Independent political, economic, social and cultural bulletin.

Iran Times Link: http://iran-times.com/ Opposition edition of weekly newspaper published in the US.

Iran va Jahan Link: http://www.iranvajahan.net/ Stories on Iran from the world newspapers and other media.

Iranian Labour News Agency (ILNA) Link: http://www.ilna.ir/en/news/index.cfm Aiming to provide news related to Iranian labor market.

Iranian Magazine Link: http://www.iranian.com/ Iran related articles on lifestyle, arts, history, and politics. Aimed for the Iranian diaspora.

Iranian Students News Agency (ISNA) Link: http://isna.ir/en Provides political, business and culture news.

IRIB - Islamic Republic of Iran Broadcasting Link: http://worldservice.irib.ir/ Daily news stories from official broadcaster.

IRNA - Islamic Republic News Agency Link: http://en.irna.ir/ Official news service.

Jam-e-Jam Online Link: http://www1.jamejamonline.ir/en/ Endeavoring to be a cyber newspaper for all people and a valve towards Iran.

Javanan Link: http://english.javanan.com/ Iranian publication printed in Los Angeles and distributed worldwide to over 40 countries.

Kayhan International Link: http://kayhan.ir/en Conservative Iranian newspaper published in Tehran.

Khabar Online News Agency Link: http://english.khabaronline.ir/ Political, cultural and economical news.

Mehr News Agency (MNA) Link: http://en.mehrnews.com/ Private and non-official media, providing economic, political, social, international, sports, cultural and religion news.

MEMRI: Iran Link: http://www.memri.org/content/en/country.htm?country=iran Site of Middle East Media Research Institute providing analysis and translations of Arabic and Farsi media reports.

Ministry of Foreign Affairs Link: http://en.mfa.ir/%20 Official website of Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Moj News Agency Link: http://www.mojnews.com/en.aspx Established in line with the activities of Moj Cultural Institute.

Petroenergy Information Network (Shana) Link: http://www.shana.ir/en/home Information about main national and international developments in the energy sector, publication of special issues and specialized periodicals on oil, gas, petrochemical and other sources of energy.

Payvand Link: http://www.payvand.com/ News and stories of Iran and Iranians from different sources. Includes reader-contributed articles. Independent website was established in US (California).

Press TV Link: http://www.presstv.ir/ Iranian international news network broadcasting in English on a round-the-clock basis. Offers expansive news coverage, specifically delving into Middle Eastern current affairs.

SHAFAQNA Link: http://en.shafaqna.com/ International Shia news association.

Tasnim News Agency Link: http://www.tasnimnews.com/english/ Defending the Islamic Revolution against negative media propaganda campaign and providing readers with realities on the ground about Iran and Islam, especially current wave of the Islamic Awakening in the region.

Tehran Bureau Link: http://www.theguardian.com/world/series/tehran-bureau An independent online news magazine, hosted by the Guardian, covering politics, foreign affairs, culture and society in Iran and the Iranian diaspora.

Tehran Times Link: http://www.tehrantimes.com/ Leading English-language daily Iranian newspaper.

Young Journalists Club Link: http://www.yjc.ir/en News written by young journalists.

People's Mojahedin Organization Of Iran Link: http://www.mojahedin.org/pagesen/index.aspx News and information from the largest opposition - People's Mojahedin Organization of Iran.
